## TransactableLiquity.pngUnstakeUniTokens() method

Withdraw Png Pool2 LP tokens from liquidity mining.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pngUnstakeUniTokens(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LP tokens to withdraw. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
